ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I finally have it narrowed down when it comes to new character classes I would like to have. 1)a Mimic character class 2)a Chemist character class -

Actually, I finally have it narrowed down when it comes to new 
character classes I would like to have.

1)a Mimic character class

2)a Chemist character class - a character that throws knives as a 
normal weapon, but can acquire the potions.  the 1st one would be 
invisibility; 2nd, flight; 3rd, speed; and 4th, invulvernability. 
The 
 alternate to each of those attacks would be to create the potion for 
other teammates to use.

3)a Practical Mage character class - yep, another offshoot of the 
Mage.  It would still have the basic teleport abilities.  This one 
could teleport teammates and as an alternate teleport enemies.  Also, 
this one could freeze time, and as an alternate slow down time for 
enemies.  It could create teleporters and as an alternate create
black 
 holes.  The black holes would kill enemies and teammates alike when 
they entered it.

I noticed a mage's magical bolts are more powerfull than a heartburst 
attack because a heartburst attack takes more energy to kill a 
character.
